welcome_message_body: Welcome to Matsubushi! This charming city is known for its beautiful gardens and traditional Japanese architecture. We invite you to explore and experience all that Matsubushi has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport, with a limit of 2 hours per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used for official military flights and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
